originalText.text: Dr. Kornbluth is a truly special person and a unique doctor. From the moment that he met my wife, he went out of his way to help us. He made sure that we were connected with a top surgeon and he held our hand throughout the surgery and recovery. Dr. Kornbluth is endlessly compassionate and understanding. You will not find a more caring, dedicated and competent doctor for IBD.

text.text: Dr. Kornbluth is a truly special person and a unique doctor. From the moment that he met my wife, he went out of his way to help us. He made sure that we were connected with a top surgeon and he held our hand throughout the surgery and recovery. Dr. Kornbluth is endlessly compassionate and understanding. You will not find a more caring, dedicated and competent doctor for IBD.

originalText.text: I have been a patient of Dr Kornbluth since 2014. I trust him with my complete health care and he has always been available to me either with a quick response in the patient portal or by a phone call. He is one of the best doctors I have ever had experience with.

text.text: I have been a patient of Dr Kornbluth since 2014. I trust him with my complete health care and he has always been available to me either with a quick response in the patient portal or by a phone call. He is one of the best doctors I have ever had experience with.

originalText.text: Dr Kornbluth is one of the best and nicest doctors that you will ever meet. He truly cares about his patients.

text.text: Dr Kornbluth is one of the best and nicest doctors that you will ever meet. He truly cares about his patients.

originalText.text: Dr Kornbluth is the best because I HATE my Crohn’s disease, and he hears my frustrations. He has created a thoughtful and personal medical treatment to my disease so I can live my life.  He is also a good listener and good natured which makes my appointments a little less hard. I don’t know what I would do without his practice. I am a grateful to be his patient.

He is also a good listener and good natured which makes my appointments a little less hard. I don’t know what I would do without his practice. I am a grateful to be his patient.

originalText.text: Dr Kornbluth always spends a ton of time with you answering all of your questions and concerns. He is extremely knowledgeable about IBD. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND HIM!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
